content.html: Labelling as "indoctrination" the teaching of tolerance of diversity (which is about discouraging children from bullying each other) and calling for this to be banned would not sound like free speech, but a return to beat-it-to-fit-and-paint-it-to-match socialisation of children.
content.value: Labelling as "indoctrination" the teaching of tolerance of diversity (which is about discouraging children from bullying each other) and calling for this to be banned would not sound like free speech, but a return to beat-it-to-fit-and-paint-it-to-match socialisation of children.
